message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.DC, cs.NI

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper focuses on integrating security mechanisms into real-time systems and measuring their effectiveness, which falls under the scope of cryptography and security.
2. cs.SE (Software Engineering) - The paper proposes a new approach for integrating security mechanisms into legacy real-time systems, which involves software engineering principles.
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper deals with real-time systems, which are a subset of systems and control.
4. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper discusses hierarchical scheduling, which is a technique used in distributed and parallel computing.
5. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper may involve networking aspects related to real-time systems and their security.
